name: The Council Hall
description:
I believe that we can rebuild forgotten civilizations.
And start all over again.
Great start, this time much better.

The Council Hall
The fourth NFT of Persepolis NFTs collection.
Reconstruction of the council hall in Persepolis 𐎱𐎠𐎼𐎿
The Council hall or Tripylon is one of the palaces of Persepolis in Persia that was built in 550 BC.
Archaeologists say that the council hall was a meeting place, where the king could receive his advisers.
